<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="md" type="light" variant="light">
    <b-navbar-brand href="#" @click="setCurrentChallenge('')">VAST</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-toggle target="navbarNav"></b-navbar-toggle>
    <b-collapse id="navbarNav" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
        <b-nav-item v-b-hover class="challenge-button" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge2')">Challenge 2</b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item v-b-hover class="challenge-button" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge3')">Challenge 3</b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
  name: 'Header',
  methods: {
    setCurrentChallenge(challenge) {
      this.$emit('challenge-selected', challenge);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
nav {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.challenge-button {
  transition: background-color 0.3s, color 0.3s;
  position: relative;
}

.challenge-button::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 0;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: transparent;
  transition: width 0.3s, background-color 0s;
  z-index: -1;
}

.challenge-button:hover::before {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5); /* Colore blu con trasparenza */
}

.challenge-button[data-challenge="Challenge3"]::before {
  background-color: rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.5); /* Colore rosa con trasparenza */
}

.challenge-button[data-challenge="Challenge3"]:hover::before {
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
